newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's NLCF buys 28,000T oilseeds, passes other.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's NLCF buys 28,000T oilseeds, passes other.

text.p: South Korea's National Livestock Cooperatives Federation (NLCF) said on Tuesday it bought 28,000 tonnes of rapeseed meal and passed on tenders for another 14,000 tonnes of rapeseed meal and 30,000 tonnes of tapioca hard pellet due to high offer prices.
An NLCF official said it was unable to buy 8,000 tonnes of grain screening pellet due to an absence of offers.
Traders said the lowest bid for the passed tapioca tenders was made by Haitai International Inc at $97.20 a tonne C&F.
Details for the tender results are as follows:
COMMODS TONNE ETA PRICE SELLER ARRIVAL PORT

rapeseed meal 7,000 Jul 20 $144.48 P.Cremer Inchon rapeseed meal 7,000 Jul 30 $145.48 P.Cremer Kunsan/Ulsan rapeseed meal 7,000 Aug 20 $146.17 G.Premjee Inchon rapeseed meal 7,000 Aug 30 $146.17 G.Premjee Kunsan/Ulsan rapeseed meal 7,000 Sep 20 PASSED Inchon
